alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Lawrence; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 1:26PM CDT until March 22 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Simpson County in central Mississippi... Northern Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Southeastern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 126 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hopewell to 6 miles southwest of Sontag, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mendenhall, Pinola, Union, Oma, Shivers, Sontag, Rockport, Wanilla, New Hebron and Georgetown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
